scripts.build:es: rollup --config build/rollup.config.es.js && rollup --config build/rollup.config.es-compat.js && rollup --config build/rollup.config.es-modern.js
scripts.build:web: rollup --config build/rollup.config.web.js && rollup --config build/rollup.config.web-compat.js && rollup --config build/rollup.config.web-modern.js
scripts.build:sky: rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky.js && rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky-compat.js && rollup --config build/rollup.config.sky-modern.js
